OUR SOLDIERS, OUR FRIENDS, OUR LOVED ONES, AND THEY

SHE IS THE SECRETARY OF STATE.

NEED TO HEAR WHAT'S GOING ON.

AND THEN HE GOES IN ON THE THIRD.

THAT'S NOT JUSTICE. >> NOT AT ALL.
